channel.title: CVE Feed for Nvidia Corporation -- Jetson
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nvidia Corporation -- Jetson

item.title: CVE-2017-6273|2024-08-05T15:25:48.990Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- jetson
item.description: NVIDIA ADSP Firmware contains a vulnerability in the ADSP Loader component where there is the potential to write to a memory location that is outside the intended boundary of the buffer, which may lead to denial of service or possible escalation of privileges.
